import { Link, Navigate, useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useEffect, useState} from "react" // import './manage.css' import { toast } from "react-toastify" import axios from "axios" import { URL } from "../../../../../config" const EmpDetails = () => { const { state } = useLocation() const [empDetails, setEmpDetails] = useState([]) const navigate = useNavigate() const { id } = state const getAllEmpDetails = () => { const url = `${URL}/admin/getuser/${id}` axios.get(url).then((response) => { const result = response.data if(result['status'] == 'success') { setEmpDetails(result['data']) } else { toast.error(result['error']) } }) } const getEmpDetails = () => { const url1 = `${URL}/admin/employeedetails{}` axios.get(url1).then((response) => { const result = response.data // console.log(result.data) if (result.status === 'success') { setEmpDetails(result.data) } else { console.log(result.error) toast.error(result['error']) } }) } useEffect(() => { getAllEmp() }, []) // const saveStatus = () => { // } // const saveSalary = () => { // } return(

Employee Details







) } export default EmpDetails
